steps.expanded_query: /* select#2 */ select `a1`.`pom_id` AS `pom_id`,group_concat(`b1`.`contract_no` separator ',') AS `contract_no`,group_concat(`c1`.`project_no` separator ',') AS `project_no` from ((`pom_follow_huawei_bind` `a1` join `conm_contract` `b1`) join `pro_project` `c1`) where ((`a1`.`contractid` = `b1`.`id`) and (`a1`.`projectid` = `c1`.`id`)) group by `a1`.`pom_id`

/* select#4 */ select `b9`.`pom_id` AS `pom_id`,group_concat(distinct `a9`.`bill_date` separator ',') AS `invoice_date`,group_concat(distinct `a9`.`bill_name` separator ',') AS `bill_name` from (`icm_bill` `a9` join `icm_des_pom_done` `b9`) where (`a9`.`des_id` = `b9`.`des_id`) group by `b9`.`pom_id`

/* select#3 */ select `a2`.`pom_id_real` AS `pom_id`,group_concat(`b2`.`contract_no` separator ',') AS `contract_no_in`,group_concat(`c2`.`project_no` separator ',') AS `project_no_in`,group_concat(concat(round(`a2`.`counts`,4),'归入',convert(date_format(`invoice_bind`.`invoice_date`,'%Y-%m-%d') using utf8mb4)) separator ',') AS `invoice_date`,group_concat(distinct `invoice_bind`.`bill_name` separator ',') AS `bill_name`,sum(`a2`.`counts`) AS `invoiceamount` from (((`pom_order_huawei_bind` `a2` join `conm_contract` `b2`) join `pro_project` `c2`) left join (/* select#4 */ select `b9`.`pom_id` AS `pom_id`,group_concat(distinct `a9`.`bill_date` separator ',') AS `invoice_date`,group_concat(distinct `a9`.`bill_name` separator ',') AS `bill_name` from (`icm_bill` `a9` join `icm_des_pom_done` `b9`) where (`a9`.`des_id` = `b9`.`des_id`) group by `b9`.`pom_id`) `invoice_bind` on((`a2`.`pom_id` = `invoice_bind`.`pom_id`))) where ((`a2`.`contractid` = `b2`.`id`) and (`a2`.`projectid` = `c2`.`id`)) group by `a2`.`pom_id_real`

/* select#5 */ select max(`conm_contract`.`id`) AS `contractid`,`conm_contract`.`contract_no_other` AS `contract_no_other`,max(`conm_contract`.`contract_no`) AS `contract_no` from `conm_contract` where (`conm_contract`.`contract_no_other` <> '') group by `conm_contract`.`contract_no_other`

/* select#1 */ select `polist_huawei`.`poNumber` AS `poNumber`,`polist_huawei`.`poLineNum` AS `poLineNum`,`polist_huawei`.`startDate` AS `startDate`,date_format(`polist_huawei`.`promiseDate`,'%Y/%m/%d') AS `lastUpdateDate`,`polist_huawei`.`repOfficeName` AS `repOfficeName`,`polist_huawei`.`deptCode` AS `deptCode`,`polist_huawei`.`engInfoCentralZone` AS `engInfoCentralZone`,`polist_huawei`.`engInfoEngineeringName` AS `projectInfo`,`polist_huawei`.`itemDescription` AS `itemDescription`,`polist_huawei`.`quantity` AS `quantity`,`polist_huawei`.`priceOverride` AS `priceOverride`,`polist_huawei`.`taxRate` AS `taxRate`,round(`y`.`invoiceamount`,4) AS `sale_count`,round((`y`.`invoiceamount` - ifnull(`g`.`get_count`,0)),4) AS `curr_count`,`g`.`get_date` AS `get_date`,`g`.`get_count` AS `get_count`,`z`.`contractid` AS `contractid`,(case when (`c`.`contract_no` is null) then `z`.`contract_no` else `c`.`contract_no` end) AS `contract_no`,`c`.`project_no` AS `project_no`,`y`.`contract_no_in` AS `contract_no_in`,`y`.`project_no_in` AS `project_no_in`,`polist_huawei`.`lineLocationId` AS `lineLocationId`,`polist_huawei`.`department_id` AS `department_id`,(case when ((`y`.`invoiceamount` > 0) and (round((`y`.`invoiceamount` - ifnull(`g`.`get_count`,0)),4) <= 0)) then 2 else `polist_huawei`.`postate` end) AS `postate`,`sys_department`.`text` AS `text`,`y`.`invoice_date` AS `invoicetime`,`y`.`bill_name` AS `bill_name`,round((round(((`polist_huawei`.`quantity` * `polist_huawei`.`priceOverride`) * (1 + `polist_huawei`.`taxRate`)),4) - ifnull(`y`.`invoiceamount`,0)),4) AS `noinvoice_count`,round(((`polist_huawei`.`quantity` * `polist_huawei`.`priceOverride`) * (1 + `polist_huawei`.`taxRate`)),4) AS `total_count`,round(((`polist_huawei`.`quantity` * `polist_huawei`.`priceOverride`) * `polist_huawei`.`taxRate`),4) AS `tax_count`,`polist_huawei`.`publishDate` AS `collectdate`,`polist_huawei`.`shipmentStatus` AS `postatus1`,`polist_huawei`.`engInfo` AS `engInfo`,`polist_huawei`.`publishDate` AS `publishDate`,`polist_huawei`.`orgName` AS `orgName`,`polist_huawei`.`quantityUnaccepted` AS `quantityUnaccepted` from (((((`polist_huawei` left join (/* select#2 */ select `a1`.`pom_id` AS `pom_id`,group_concat(`b1`.`contract_no` separator ',') AS `contract_no`,group_concat(`c1`.`project_no` separator ',') AS `project_no` from ((`pom_follow_huawei_bind` `a1` join `conm_contract` `b1`) join `pro_project` `c1`) where ((`a1`.`contractid` = `b1`.`id`) and (`a1`.`projectid` = `c1`.`id`)) group by `a1`.`pom_id`) `c` on((`polist_huawei`.`lineLocationId` = `c`.`pom_id`))) left join `sys_department` on((`polist_huawei`.`department_id` = `sys_department`.`id`))) left join `v_icm_pom_get_table` `g` on((`polist_huawei`.`lineLocationId` = `g`.`pom_id_real`))) left join (/* select#3 */ select `a2`.`pom_id_real` AS `pom_id`,group_concat(`b2`.`contract_no` separator ',') AS `contract_no_in`,group_concat(`c2`.`project_no` separator ',') AS `project_no_in`,group_concat(concat(round(`a2`.`counts`,4),'归入',convert(date_format(`invoice_bind`.`invoice_date`,'%Y-%m-%d') using utf8mb4)) separator ',') AS `invoice_date`,group_concat(distinct `invoice_bind`.`bill_name` separator ',') AS `bill_name`,sum(`a2`.`counts`) AS `invoiceamount` from (((`pom_order_huawei_bind` `a2` join `conm_contract` `b2`) join `pro_project` `c2`) left join (/* select#4 */ select `b9`.`pom_id` AS `pom_id`,group_concat(distinct `a9`.`bill_date` separator ',') AS `invoice_date`,group_concat(distinct `a9`.`bill_name` separator ',') AS `bill_name` from (`icm_bill` `a9` join `icm_des_pom_done` `b9`) where (`a9`.`des_id` = `b9`.`des_id`) group by `b9`.`pom_id`) `invoice_bind` on((`a2`.`pom_id` = `invoice_bind`.`pom_id`))) where ((`a2`.`contractid` = `b2`.`id`) and (`a2`.`projectid` = `c2`.`id`)) group by `a2`.`pom_id_real`) `y` on((`polist_huawei`.`lineLocationId` = `y`.`pom_id`))) left join (/* select#5 */ select max(`conm_contract`.`id`) AS `contractid`,`conm_contract`.`contract_no_other` AS `contract_no_other`,max(`conm_contract`.`contract_no`) AS `contract_no` from `conm_contract` where (`conm_contract`.`contract_no_other` <> '') group by `conm_contract`.`contract_no_other`) `z` on((substr(`polist_huawei`.`subcontractNo`,1,32) = `z`.`contract_no_other`))) limit 1
